titleStmt.title: Saint Peters watch word the end of all things is at hand / digested into eight chapters, and published by R.M. minister ; perused and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Mavericke, Radford, b. 1561?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.W. dwelling at Powles Wharfe, at the signe of the Crosse-keyes,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained, tightly bound and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: Powles Wharfe, at the signe of the Crosse-keyes
